alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flash Flood Statement issued November 14 at 6:36PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...THE FLASH FLOOD WARNING HAS BEEN CANCELLED... FLASH FLOOD WARNING CANCELLED FOR TUTUILA AUNUU MANUA SWAINS Heavy rainfall has diminished over the Islands in the last few hours. UA FAAMUTAINA LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 635 AFIAFI ASO GAFUA NOVEMA 14 2022 UA IAI NEI SE ...UA FAAMUTAINA LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA... UA FAAMUTAINA LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA MO TUTUILA AUNUU MANUA SWAINS . Ua faaitiitia timuga mamafa i luga o le atunu`u. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Mo ave-taavale, aua ne`i uia nofoaga po o ala-tele ua lolo-vaia. Ia aga`i atu i nofoaga mapu`epu`e. Ia ripotia tulaga louloua o le tau i le ofisa o le TEMCO. E latou te faailoa mai i le Ofisa o le Tau a outou ripoti.
info.instruction: Remain cautious when driving in low lying areas...and report any flooded roadways to the emergency operations center (EOC). They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Office.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
